com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements

Class SlayRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements.Requirement
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements.SlayRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatekeepingRequirement, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class SlayRequirement
extends Requirement
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener, StatekeepingRequirement
    Requires the participants to defeat (kill) some number of a type of entity. This requirement is set up to work with parties. This requirement also will check to make sure the name of the entities slaid matches what is provided. If no name is provided, any entity of the same entity type will be considered valid.
    See Also:
    PositionRequirement
